error_details.explanation: Incomplete calculation. The cost of the vegetables should have been added, so that total cost would be 20+10+10=40.

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 10
The total cost of the hummus is 2 * $5 = $<<2*5=10>>10
The total cost of the chicken and bacon is $20 + $10 = $<<20+10=30>>30
The remaining money she has is $60 - $10 - $30 = $<<60-10-30=20>>20
The amount of apples she can purchase is $20 / $2 = <<20/2=10>>10
